content.p: This category contains policies and guidance around studies and activities that occur away from the University. These pages are relevant to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses and may also be of interest to the University's external partners. Recognition of other learning Partnerships and placements Policy on e-learning and distance learning Student Services Academic-Service-Office@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
